verses.verse: For the Chief Musician; on stringed instruments. A Psalm, a Song. <S%H430>God<s%> be <S%H2603>merciful<s%> unto <S%H1288>us<s%>, and bless <S%H6440>us<s%>, And cause his face to <S%H215>shine<s%> upon <S%H5542>us<s%>; [[Selah
That thy <S%H1870>way<s%> may be <S%H3045>known<s%> upon <S%H776>earth<s%>, Thy <S%H3444>salvation<s%> among all <S%H1471>nations<s%>.
Let the <S%H5971>peoples<s%> <S%H3034>praise<s%> <S%H430>thee<s%>, O God; Let all the <S%H5971>peoples<s%> praise <S%H3034>thee<s%>.

Oh let the <S%H3816>nations<s%> be <S%H8055>glad<s%> and sing for <S%H7442>joy<s%>; For thou wilt <S%H8199>judge<s%> the <S%H5971>peoples<s%> with <S%H4334>equity<s%>, And <S%H5148>govern<s%> the <S%H5971>nations<s%> upon <S%H776>earth<s%>. <S%H5542><s%>[[Selah
Let the <S%H5971>peoples<s%> <S%H3034>praise<s%> <S%H430>thee<s%>, O God; Let all the <S%H5971>peoples<s%> praise <S%H3034>thee<s%>.
The <S%H776>earth<s%> hath <S%H5414>yielded<s%> its <S%H2981>increase<s%>: <S%H430>God<s%>, even our own <S%H430>God<s%>, will bless <S%H1288>us<s%>.
God <S%H430><s%> will <S%H1288>bless<s%> <S%H657>us<s%>; And all the ends of the <S%H776>earth<s%> shall fear <S%H3372>him<s%>.
